extractedCSS: .animate-scroll { animation: 20s linear 0s infinite normal none running scroll; }
.animate-fadeIn { animation: 1s ease-in-out 0s 1 normal none running fadeIn; }
.animate-fadeInSlow { animation: 2s ease-in-out 0s 1 normal none running fadeIn; }
.animate-fadeInFast { animation: 1s ease-in-out 0s 1 normal none running fadeIn; }
.animate-fadeInMedium { animation: 0.5s ease-in-out 0s 1 normal none running fadeIn; }
.animate-slideDown { animation: 0.5s ease-in-out 0s 1 normal none running slideDown; }
.animate-popIn { animation: 0.5s ease-in-out 0s 1 normal forwards running popIn; }
.animate-fadeInTopToBottom { animation: 0.75s ease-in-out 0s 1 normal none running fadeInTopToBottom; }
.animate-fadeInLeftToRight, .animate-fadeInLeftToRightDelay { animation: 3s ease-in-out 0s 1 normal none running fadeInLeftToRight; }
.animate-shake { animation: 0.4s ease-in-out 0s 1 normal none running shake; }
.Container { z-index: 10; background-color: rgb(5, 28, 57); height: 150vh; position: relative; }
.Container .sticky { height: 100vh; position: sticky; top: 0px; overflow: hidden; }
.Container .sticky .el { justify-content: center; align-items: center; width: 100%; height: 100%; display: flex; position: absolute; top: 0px; }
.fixed-image { z-index: -1; width: 100%; position: fixed; top: 0px; left: 0px; }

.window-mask { mask-image: linear-gradient(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(0, 0, 0)), url("/window.svg"); mask-position: 50% center, 50% center; mask-size: auto, 300px; mask-repeat: no-repeat; mask-composite: exclude; }

A School That Thinks Forward

The Newtown School, Kolkata stands as a beacon of innovation and sustainability in education. As Indias first IGBC Gold Certified Green School, we are committed to creating an environment where learning thrives in harmony with nature. At the cusp of global transformation, our institution blends academic excellence with future-ready skills, nurturing students to become thoughtful leaders of tomorrow. With a strong focus on holistic development, The Newtown School is more than an institution its a vibrant hub where curiosity meets character.

Recent Highlights

Vision

To foster the creation of an oasis of learning by shaping young minds who seek excellence in every pursuit and innovation in every approach towards life.

Mission

To provide our students with a learning environment that is future-ready with ample scope for research to hone their creative acumen.

What's in a Logo?

Nurture

The apple is a symbol of enlightenment and nurturing. It spurred Sir Isaac Newton to imagine gravity and represents nourishment and good health.

Enlighten

The gear represents transformation and progress. It enhances systems and represents motion, efficiency, and innovation.

Inspire

The incandescent bulb, invented by Edison, symbolizes inspiration. It lights minds and symbolizes epiphany and creative ignition.

Educate

The pen is mightier than the sword. Through ages of writing, it stands for education, wisdom, and the spread of civilization.

Affiliations & Certifications

CBSE Affiliation

The Newtown School Kolkata is affiliated to CBSE vide affiliation number 2430204 for secondary & senior secondary school. The permanent No Objection Certificate was issued by the School Education Department, Government of West Bengal vide letter no. 1112-SE(S)/6C-32/15 dated 18th December, 2015. This NOC was issued till Class X and subsequently extended to Class XII vide letter no. 33-SC/AIS/NOC dated 19th December, 2017.

You can view or download our official CBSE affiliation certificate here:

IGBC Green School Certification

The Newtown School, Kolkata is the first school in India to receive certification under the New Schools Category of the IGBC Green Schools Rating System.

A School That Thinks Forward

The Newtown School, Kolkata stands as a beacon of innovation and sustainability in education. As Indias first IGBC Gold Certified Green School, we are committed to creating an environment where learning thrives in harmony with nature. At the cusp of global transformation, our institution blends academic excellence with future-ready skills, nurturing students to become thoughtful leaders of tomorrow. With a strong focus on holistic development, The Newtown School is more than an institution its a vibrant hub where curiosity meets character.

Recent Highlights

Vision

To foster the creation of an oasis of learning by shaping young minds who seek excellence in every pursuit and innovation in every approach towards life.

Mission

To provide our students with a learning environment that is future-ready with ample scope for research to hone their creative acumen.

What's in a Logo?

Nurture

The apple is a symbol of enlightenment and nurturing. It spurred Sir Isaac Newton to imagine gravity and represents nourishment and good health.

Enlighten

The gear represents transformation and progress. It enhances systems and represents motion, efficiency, and innovation.

Inspire

The incandescent bulb, invented by Edison, symbolizes inspiration. It lights minds and symbolizes epiphany and creative ignition.

Educate

The pen is mightier than the sword. Through ages of writing, it stands for education, wisdom, and the spread of civilization.

The gear represents transformation and progress. It enhances systems and represents motion, efficiency, and innovation.

The incandescent bulb, invented by Edison, symbolizes inspiration. It lights minds and symbolizes epiphany and creative ignition.

Educate

The pen is mightier than the sword. Through ages of writing, it stands for education, wisdom, and the spread of civilization.

Affiliations & Certifications

CBSE Affiliation

The Newtown School Kolkata is affiliated to CBSE vide affiliation number 2430204 for secondary & senior secondary school. The permanent No Objection Certificate was issued by the School Education Department, Government of West Bengal vide letter no. 1112-SE(S)/6C-32/15 dated 18th December, 2015. This NOC was issued till Class X and subsequently extended to Class XII vide letter no. 33-SC/AIS/NOC dated 19th December, 2017.

You can view or download our official CBSE affiliation certificate here:

IGBC Green School Certification

The Newtown School, Kolkata is the first school in India to receive certification under the New Schools Category of the IGBC Green Schools Rating System.

Admissions are now open for the Academic Session 202627

A School That Thinks Forward

The Newtown School, Kolkata stands as a beacon of innovation and sustainability in education. As Indias first IGBC Gold Certified Green School, we are committed to creating an environment where learning thrives in harmony with nature. At the cusp of global transformation, our institution blends academic excellence with future-ready skills, nurturing students to become thoughtful leaders of tomorrow. With a strong focus on holistic development, The Newtown School is more than an institution its a vibrant hub where curiosity meets character.

Recent Highlights

Vision

To foster the creation of an oasis of learning by shaping young minds who seek excellence in every pursuit and innovation in every approach towards life.

Mission

To provide our students with a learning environment that is future-ready with ample scope for research to hone their creative acumen.

What's in a Logo?

Nurture

The apple is a symbol of enlightenment and nurturing. It spurred Sir Isaac Newton to imagine gravity and represents nourishment and good health.

Enlighten

The gear represents transformation and progress. It enhances systems and represents motion, efficiency, and innovation.

Inspire

The incandescent bulb, invented by Edison, symbolizes inspiration. It lights minds and symbolizes epiphany and creative ignition.

Educate

The pen is mightier than the sword. Through ages of writing, it stands for education, wisdom, and the spread of civilization.

Enlighten

The gear represents transformation and progress. It enhances systems and represents motion, efficiency, and innovation.

Inspire

The incandescent bulb, invented by Edison, symbolizes inspiration. It lights minds and symbolizes epiphany and creative ignition.

Educate

The pen is mightier than the sword. Through ages of writing, it stands for education, wisdom, and the spread of civilization.

Affiliations & Certifications

CBSE Affiliation

The Newtown School Kolkata is affiliated to CBSE vide affiliation number 2430204 for secondary & senior secondary school. The permanent No Objection Certificate was issued by the School Education Department, Government of West Bengal vide letter no. 1112-SE(S)/6C-32/15 dated 18th December, 2015. This NOC was issued till Class X and subsequently extended to Class XII vide letter no. 33-SC/AIS/NOC dated 19th December, 2017.

You can view or download our official CBSE affiliation certificate here:

IGBC Green School Certification

The Newtown School, Kolkata is the first school in India to receive certification under the New Schools Category of the IGBC Green Schools Rating System.

Admissions are now open for the Academic Session 202627

CURRICULUM

Learning from the best minds in education and industry

FOUNDATIONAL STAGE (NURSERY TO CLASS II)

Overview

Set amidst greenery with a vibrant play area, the Foundational Stage is a nurturing "home away from home" for our youngest learners. This stage fosters creativity, curiosity, and joyful learning, allowing children to blossom into confident individuals. Children engage in a balance of formal and informal activities such as singing, storytelling, games, art, and physical education. A well-stocked Junior Resource Centre further supports language and literacy development.

Teaching Methodology

Our environment encourages exploration through structured play, hands-on learning, and collaborative activities using swings, puzzles, block games, and digital tools. Experiential learning and role play deepen understanding while building communication and social-emotional skills. Classrooms feature interactive boards, iPads, and an iTheatre lab to support 21st-century learning. STEM concepts introduced through LEGO Simple Machines nurture creativity and critical thinking. Subjects and experiences are thoughtfully designed to promote well-rounded, sensory-rich development.

Subjects (NUR, LKG AND UKG)

  • Language
  • Mathematics
  • Environmental Science

Subjects (CLASSES I AND II)

  • Languages
  • Mathematics
  • Environmental Science
  • Computer Science

Co-Curricular Activities

NUR-UKG

  • Art and Craft
  • Dance
  • Music
  • P.E.
  • Library
  • Quality Circle Time

LKG-UKG

  • iPad Lab Activities
  • iTheatre Animation
  • STEM

CLASSES I AND II

  • Art and Craft
  • Sculpture
  • Dance
  • Music
  • P.E.
  • Swimming
  • Gymnastics
  • Yoga
  • Library
  • iPad Lab Activities
  • STEM

Evaluation

NUR, LKG AND UKG

Evaluation is continuous and informal, based on observations and activity-based assessments over three terms. This approach nurtures each child's unique growth journey.

CLASSES I AND II

Evaluation is a blend of informal and formal methods, including observations, practice work, revision worksheets, and activity-based tasks across three terms. In Classes I and II, this continues with added term-end assessments, ensuring steady progress throughout the year.

  • Result

  • Policies
  • Partners
  • Clubs

PARTNERS

Learning from the best minds in education and industry

Futurite

To take the essence of hands on-learning a step further and to engage children into learning and discovery, a 3D Printing Lab has been set up with the state of the art Ultimaker Pro machine being installed in it, for students of classes III-VIII. The students have two dedicated periods over a week to know and experience the excitement of 3D Printing. Futurite has provided with an age appropriate curriculum along with the resource persons for the Lab.

School Cinema

School Cinema is an innovative concept developed by EduMedia and adopted by The Newtown School. Developed through research and taught using short films, thought-provoking workbooks and activities, this learning module for children, teachers and parents, helps them understand and reaffirm values, attitudes, morals and essential life lessons or life skills. The School Cinema Programme enhances learning in a mode that is enjoyable, memorable and educative. The key message in every film is reinforced by age appropriate activities that are designed with the objective to help children use their senses, build healthy relationships and express themselves in a secure space. This is another tool to help in the development of their multiple intelligence capabilities.

Vedic Maths India

The Maths Club is being run by the Vedic Maths Forum India in order to make Maths fun, interesting and engaging for the students at The Newtown School. Students not only become effortless and quick in their calculations but also develop a solid foundation in Mathematics. Students learn Vedic Maths skills along with solving the Rubiks cube, Celebrating National Maths Days or a Pi day or simply watching Maths oriented movies and prepare for competitive examinations like Maths Olympiads etc.

Dibyendu Barua Chess Academy

Our Saturday Clubs have been planned with the sole objective that children take up their interests and hobbies with absolute seriousness. Thus for our Chess Club we have joined hands with the Dibyendu Barua Chess Academy to guide our children through the various moves and intricacies of Chess and to build upon their confidence and tact of the game.

Future Fit Gymnastics

Future Fit Gymnastics is Indias largest privately owned Gymnastics Coaching Academy for children. Gymnastics mother of all sports is the best way to put children on path to lifelong fitness. Hence, partnering with The New Town School, Future Fits qualified and safety-certified team ensures that children are learning in a fun and safe environment, challenging both their mind and their physical fitness.

Energywin Technologies

Our unique RFID based smart attendance system for students tracking, bus tracking and automated attendance monitoring for the students has been provided by this Bangalore based company.

Agorae

Agorae is a school communication app that connects parents, students, and teachers in realtime. It enables easy sharing of class notes, doubts, results, attendance, assignments, and feedbackall through a central platform tailored for educational institutions.

NrXen

JNrXen (www.nrxen.com) is a national level award winning Nasscom 10000 start up. Nrxen provides innovative and cutting edge technology solutions for premium schools and colleges. Nrxen provides cost effective full spectrum of products like bus live video surveillance, RFID based bus and school attendance, Modular ERP and GPS based parent alert systems. NrXen has been providing the bus surveillance system for The Newtown School.

SCIENCE OLYMPIAD FOUNDATION (SOF)

To create a healthy spirit of competition in order to prepare students for some of the toughest challenges in the course of their career building, The Newtown School has registered with Science Olympiad Foundation. SOF conducts the biggest Olympiad Exams in Computers, Science, Mathematics and English, enabling students to gauge their performance, compete with peers as well as secure scholarships.

Acadally

With its innovative AI engine, AcadAlly is committed to delivering personalised learning solutions that align with the National Education Policy and transcend geographical and board-related boundaries.

Jobs In Education

Jobs in Education is Indias largest job portal dedicated to teaching and non-teaching roles across schools, colleges EdTech, and coaching institutes. It connects education professionals with verified opportunities nationwide through AI-powered matching, free resume tools, and real-time alerts.

Agorae is a school communication app that connects parents, students, and teachers in realtime. It enables easy sharing of class notes, doubts, results, attendance, assignments, and feedbackall through a central platform tailored for educational institutions.

NrXen

JNrXen (www.nrxen.com) is a national level award winning Nasscom 10000 start up. Nrxen provides innovative and cutting edge technology solutions for premium schools and colleges. Nrxen provides cost effective full spectrum of products like bus live video surveillance, RFID based bus and school attendance, Modular ERP and GPS based parent alert systems. NrXen has been providing the bus surveillance system for The Newtown School.

SCIENCE OLYMPIAD FOUNDATION (SOF)

To create a healthy spirit of competition in order to prepare students for some of the toughest challenges in the course of their career building, The Newtown School has registered with Science Olympiad Foundation. SOF conducts the biggest Olympiad Exams in Computers, Science, Mathematics and English, enabling students to gauge their performance, compete with peers as well as secure scholarships.

Acadally

With its innovative AI engine, AcadAlly is committed to delivering personalised learning solutions that align with the National Education Policy and transcend geographical and board-related boundaries.

Jobs In Education

Jobs in Education is Indias largest job portal dedicated to teaching and non-teaching roles across schools, colleges EdTech, and coaching institutes. It connects education professionals with verified opportunities nationwide through AI-powered matching, free resume tools, and real-time alerts.

PARTNERS

Learning from the best minds in education and industry

Futurite

To take the essence of hands on-learning a step further and to engage children into learning and discovery, a 3D Printing Lab has been set up with the state of the art Ultimaker Pro machine being installed in it, for students of classes III-VIII. The students have two dedicated periods over a week to know and experience the excitement of 3D Printing. Futurite has provided with an age appropriate curriculum along with the resource persons for the Lab.

School Cinema

School Cinema is an innovative concept developed by EduMedia and adopted by The Newtown School. Developed through research and taught using short films, thought-provoking workbooks and activities, this learning module for children, teachers and parents, helps them understand and reaffirm values, attitudes, morals and essential life lessons or life skills. The School Cinema Programme enhances learning in a mode that is enjoyable, memorable and educative. The key message in every film is reinforced by age appropriate activities that are designed with the objective to help children use their senses, build healthy relationships and express themselves in a secure space. This is another tool to help in the development of their multiple intelligence capabilities.

Vedic Maths India

The Maths Club is being run by the Vedic Maths Forum India in order to make Maths fun, interesting and engaging for the students at The Newtown School. Students not only become effortless and quick in their calculations but also develop a solid foundation in Mathematics. Students learn Vedic Maths skills along with solving the Rubiks cube, Celebrating National Maths Days or a Pi day or simply watching Maths oriented movies and prepare for competitive examinations like Maths Olympiads etc.

Dibyendu Barua Chess Academy

Our Saturday Clubs have been planned with the sole objective that children take up their interests and hobbies with absolute seriousness. Thus for our Chess Club we have joined hands with the Dibyendu Barua Chess Academy to guide our children through the various moves and intricacies of Chess and to build upon their confidence and tact of the game.

Future Fit Gymnastics

Future Fit Gymnastics is Indias largest privately owned Gymnastics Coaching Academy for children. Gymnastics mother of all sports is the best way to put children on path to lifelong fitness. Hence, partnering with The New Town School, Future Fits qualified and safety-certified team ensures that children are learning in a fun and safe environment, challenging both their mind and their physical fitness.

EVENTS

Learning from the best minds in education and industry

Deepawali 2025

Divyam lit up The Newtown School with devotion, joy, and light a Diwali of hearts aglow.

October 17, 2025

Annual Day 2025 for Class 4

Class 4 shone bright in Yellow Days with cheerful and vibrant performances.

October 11, 2025

Annual Day 2025 for Class 3

Class 3 amazed all with Yellow Storm, a burst of colour, energy and joy.

October 11, 2025

Campus France Session

Students of Classes XI & XII at The Newtown School, Kolkata explored study opportunities in France with an insightful Campus France session.

October 8, 2025

Celebrating Navratri!

Class 1 & 2 students of The Newtown School filled the campus with festive songs & dances.

September 25, 2025

Annual Day 2025 for Class 5

The Yellow Bird showcased Class 5 talents with vibrant performances and joy on stage.

September 25, 2025

TEDx 2025

The Newtown School organized TEDx 2025, featuring six inspiring speakers who shared future-shaping perspectives.

September 19, 2025

Podcast Studio Inauguration

Exciting news! The Newtown School Podcast Studio students & educators sharing ideas, stories, and insights.

September 12, 2025

Teachers Day 2025

Teachers Day & 10 years of NTS celebrated with joy, gratitude, magic & laughter at Taj Taal Kutir!

September 5, 2025

Ganesh Chaturthi

LKG & UKG students celebrated Ganesh Chaturthi with prayers, songs & joy at The Newtown School.

August 29, 2025

Stardust and Equation

Alumna Saptadwipa Mitra inspires Class XI & XII with Stardust & Equation: The Science of the Cosmos

August 19, 2025

Independence Day

NTS celebrated Independence Day with patriotic zeal through flag hoisting and vibrant cultural performances.

August 15, 2025

Overseas Education Event

A special seminar on Overseas Education was conducted by Mr. Nirmal Agarwal offering guidance on global academic opportunities.

August 14, 2025

Unity in Diversity

Special Assembly by the students of Classes I and II on Unity in Diversity.

August 14, 2025

International Universities Fair (Ireland)

The Ireland Universities Fair introduced students to University College Dublin and Trinity College Dublin, providing a glimpse into higher education and career opportunities in Ireland.

August 7, 2025

Novus 2025

NTS proudly presents NOVUS 2025 a celebration of talent, creativity, and innovation.

August 3, 2025

Friendly Football Match

NTS organized a Friendly Football Match against its alumni, fostering sportsmanship, camaraderie, and team spirit.

July 24, 2025

International Universities Fair (UK)

The UK Universities Session featured leading institutions including Imperial College London, the University of Birmingham, and the University of Nottingham, helping students explore academic prospects in the UK.

July 21, 2025

Fermat Theorem Workshop

Students delved into proofs, paradoxes, and number theory during the engaging Fermats Theorem Workshop at NTS.

July 18, 2025

Bastielle Day Celebration

Celebrated Bastille Day with a vibrant showcase of culture, graced by Consul General Mr. Didier Talpain and Mr. S.P. Saharia.

July 17, 2025

EDUX 2025

Exploring emerging education trends and future opportunities, NTS hosted the EduX 2025 event, inspiring innovation and forward-thinking in learning.

July 16, 2025

Web Development Workshop

Hands-on learning and innovation took center stage at the Web Development Workshop conducted by alumnus Mr. Suprotiv Moitra at The Newtown School.

July 12, 2025

Teacher Training Session

Empowering educators with impactful strategies to enhance communication and foster dynamic classrooms, a Teacher Training Session was conducted at NTS led by Ms. Sangita Bhattacharya.

July 12, 2025

Portfolio for Creative Careers

Students explored creative career paths and built portfolios at this inspiring NTS event.

July 10, 2025

Rock Climbing First Class

Students embraced adventure and teamwork as they scaled new heights during the inaugural RockClimbing class at NTS, blending excitement with skill-building.

July 7, 2025

Debating Excellence

Debating Excellence at NTS, in collaboration with the Calcutta Debating Club, showcased students' sharp critical thinking, logical reasoning, and exceptional communication skills.

July 3, 2025

Foreign Universities Fair

The Foreign Universities Fair connected students with top institutions like the University of Sydney,the University of Hong Kong, and Kings College London, offering insights into global education opportunities.

July 1, 2025

Indian Universities Fair

The Indian University Fair held at NTS connected students with top universities and diverse career paths, featuring institutions like Ashoka, FLAME, and O.P. Jindal Global.

June 27, 2025

The Impact of Generative AI on the Future of Learning and Work

A session on Generative AI, facilitated by Dr. Arkoprovo Sarkar, Assistant Professor at Suffolk University, Boston, USA, explored its transformative impact on the future of learning and the workplace.

June 25, 2025

Rock Climbing Inauguration

We inaugurated a 3624 ft Rock-Climbing Wall at NTS, creating an exciting avenue to promote adventure, enhance fitness, and build confidence in our students.

June 18, 2025

Classes X & XII Annual Prize Distribution

NTS hosted an inspiring event featuring Saina Nehwal and felicitated board toppers for their outstanding achievements.

June 10, 2025

Workshop on Awareness of Substance Abuse

NTS hosted an inspiring event featuring Saina Nehwal and felicitated board toppers for their outstanding achievements.

June 5, 2025

CA as a Career Choice

A moderated session on Chartered Accountancy as a Career Choice, where an expert panel shared insights on career scope, evolving roles, and personal journeys to inspire students.

May 27, 2025

Investiture Ceremony 2025

The Investiture Ceremony 2025 honoured young leaders by bestowing badges of duty and responsibility.

April 11, 2025

Parents' Orientation

NTS hosted a Parents' Orientation to foster collaboration and communicate the schools vision and goals.

April 2, 2025

Parents & Teachers' Orientation

NTS held a Parents & Teachers' Orientation to strengthen partnerships and align shared goals for student success.

April 1, 2025

Class-III - XI Annual Day

The Annual Day (Class IIIXI) celebrated talent, cultural diversity, and vibrant student performances.

March 22, 2025

POCSO Act Workshop

Conducted a POCSO Act Workshop to raise awareness about child safety and legal protection.

March 21, 2025

AI Workshop 2025

Hosted an enriching Teachers Workshop on Multidisciplinary Teaching, showcasing the innovative GenAI-powered Spectrum Framework by Mr. Rajiv Agarwal.

March 20, 2025

Class-II Annual Day

The Class II Annual Day showcased vibrant performances, budding talents, and a joyful celebration on stage.

March 12, 2025

Class-I Annual Day

The Class I Annual Day at NTS highlighted confidence, creativity, and joyful performances that lit up the stage.

March 11, 2025

LKG-UKG Annual Day

The LKG-UKG Annual Day at NTS sparkled with joy, vibrant colours, delightful performances, and little stars shining bright on stage.

March 8, 2025

Pre-School Principals Meet 2025

NTS hosted the Pre-Principal Meet themed From Stories to Strategies, fostering collaboration,meaningful dialogue, and a shared vision for academic excellence.

February 7, 2025

Book Launch 2025

NTS hosted the book launch of Blissfully Yours Always by Antara Mohan, celebrating young literary talent and creativity.

February 4, 2025

Saraswati Puja 2025

Saraswati Puja at NTS was celebrated with devotion, rich traditions, and enthusiastic student participation.

February 2, 2025

Annual Sports Day 2025

The Annual Sports 2025 at NTS celebrated unmatched energy, teamwork, and the true spirit of sportsmanship.

January 31, 2025

A Session with Swati Sengupta

A thought-provoking session with Swati Sengupta ignited curiosity and inspired young minds at NTS.

January 29, 2025

Republic Day Cyclothon

The Republic Day Cyclothon at NTS celebrated unity, fitness, and patriotism with unwavering enthusiasm and vibrant energy.

January 26, 2025

Winter Carnival- Disneyverse

A magical fest celebrating Disney through enchanting music, lively dance, boundless joy, and beloved timeless characters.

January 25, 2025

Farewell Ceremony

A heartfelt farewell to express gratitude, convey warm wishes, and celebrate the dawn of a new beginning.

January 18, 2025

Good Wish Ceremony

The Good Wish Ceremony offered a heartfelt send-off, inspiring our Class 10 students with confidence and best wishes for success in their board examinations.

January 18, 2025
